comments:
Background
----------
I am trying to create a Dynamic Web Projects. The platform is WTP SDK I20050519.

Project creation failed with dialog:
    Save Problems
    ----
    Save could not be completed. Some related files may have already been saved.

    Reason:
    Program Error: ModelManagerImpl::saveModel. Module should be in the cache.

Click Ok on the error dialog lead to another with Stack Trace below.


Reprod
------
Right click on Dynamic Web Projects on Project Explorer
New -> J2EE Web Project
Fill the Name field.
Click Finish.


Stack Trace
-----------

Same problem occurred for EAR Project.

Thomas,

I removed the sse DOM adapter that was causing these problems in the IB last night.

I'm going to reduce severity, but keep open until a real solution is found.

Chris,

I was using I-build on May 19. Which plugins did you update? I would like to use
the cvs for the plugin for now, so that I can continue on my development.

Thanks!

Hi Charles - I'm assigning this to you - we need to keep investigating the 
issues with the sed renderer....

Are there any updates on this bug? I'm still seeing this problem intermittently 
with the 6/03 I-Build.

One note - when I get the filaure, it is always preceeded with teh following 
error (but still after I select the Finish button):
